Question
========

Temperament was measured in a random sample of 100 children. Temperament scores were almost normally distributed with $\overline{y} = 20$ and s = 5. Calculate what percentage of children score between 20 and 30. To do this, use the empirical rule. 
Answerlist
----------
* 95%
* 68%
* 47.5%
* 34%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
